resentment-1.text: Your group project earns praise, but you did most of the work while others take equal credit.
resentment-1.insight: Unspoken resentment corrodes quiet places in us.
resentment-1.reflect: When is it hardest for you to speak up?

resentment-2.text: You consider addressing the imbalance with your teacher after class.

resentment-3.text: You pull your teammate aside. They shrug and say 'We all did our part.'

resentment-4.text: You swallow the frustration. It lingers beneath your congratulations.
resentment-4.reflect: What does holding resentment cost you?

resentment-5.text: By speaking up, you open a tense but honest conversation about effort.
resentment-5.reflect: How do you weigh harmony against fairness?
